title: Metro Last Light Redux 2014 MULTi9-XaTaB
description:
::::::::::: XaTaB PRESENTS :::::::::::


:::: Metro Last Light Redux 2014 MULTi9 ::::


::Information::


Year: 26 August 2014 
Genre: Action / 3D / 1st Person 
Developer: 4A GAMES 
Publisher: Deep Silver 
Platform: PC 
Publication Type: RePack 
Language: Russian English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Ukrainian
Czech, Dutch, Polish. 
Language: Russian English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Ukrainian 
Crack: enclosing (FLT)


::Description::


Metro: Last Light Redux the best and most complete version of the classic 
game Metro Last Light, updated with the latest, most advanced version of 
the graphics core 4A Engine for video game systems of the latest generation.


::System Requirements::


OS: Windows Vista, 7, or 8 
Processor: Dual Core CPU (2.2+ GHz Dual Core CPU or better) 
Memory: 2 GB RAM 
Graphics: DirectX 10, Shader Model 3 compliant graphics cards 
(GeForce 8800 GT 512 MB, GeForce GTS 250, etc) 
DirectX: Version 10 
Hard Drive: 10 GB available space


::RePack Features::


- The basis is taken from the Steam-Rip R.G. GameWorks 
- Update 1 included. 
- Do not cut / no recoded 
- Installed Update 1 
- Game Version 1.0.0.7 
- Installation time 8 minutes 
- Repack by xatab 
- Change language and voice acting in the game settings.


::Greetz and Respect::


ALL CREDIT Goes to XaTaB for Repacking and Distribution.


::Notes::
 

Why not in a Bundle, well I took the best from both new games and as per the

Repacker shift my friend SEYTER is yet busy in his work life so hopefully if 

he wish then he could repack it, till then get the best from last light the new 

title with Enhanced and better version, play and enjoy it like shooting stars.
